pkgmetadata.longdescription: # pdm-pip-index-url`pdm-pip-index-url` is a pdm plugin that automatically converts `PIP_*INDEX_URL` to `PDM_PYPI_*` envs.For each pdm sub-command invocation, pdm will search for `PIP_*INDEX_URL` environment variables to convert them to coressponding `PDM_PYPI_*` values (see `process_pip_envs` in [./plugin.py](./pdm_pip_index_url/plugin.py) for detailed logic description).## Usage1. Install plugin: `pdm self add pdm-pip-index-url``pdm-pip-index-url` is compatbile with `python3.7+`.### LoggingTurn on logging by adding `-v` to executed command, e.g.: `pdm add -v black`.
